verses.verse: Then it <S%H1961>happened<s%> in the <S%H8666>spring,<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> when <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> out [to battle,] that <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H5090>led<s%> out the <S%H6635>army<s%> <S%H2428><s%> and <S%H7843>ravaged<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah.<s%> But <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> and <S%H2040>overthrew<s%> it.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of their <S%H4428>king<s%> from his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and he <S%H4672>found<s%> it to <S%H4948>weigh<s%> a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and there was a <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> in it; and it was <S%H1961>placed<s%> on David's <S%H7218>head.<s%> And he <S%H3318>brought<s%> out the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>great<s%> amount.

And he <S%H3318>brought<s%> out the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] in it, and <S%H7787>cut<s%> [them] with <S%H4050>saws<s%> and with <S%H2757>sharp<s%> <S%H2757>instruments<s%> and with <S%H4050>axes.<s%> And <S%H3651>thus<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%> Then <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> [to] <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>this,<s%> that <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5975>broke<s%> out at <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H5444>Sibbecai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H5598>Sippai,<s%> one of the <S%H3211>descendants<s%> of the <S%H9571>giants,<s%> and they were <S%H3665>subdued.<s%>

And there was <S%H4421>war<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> and <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3265>Jair<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H3902>Lahmi<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite,<s%> the <S%H6086>shaft<s%> of whose <S%H2595>spear<s%> [was] like a weaver's <S%H4500>beam.<s%>

And <S%H5750>again<s%> there was <S%H4421>war<s%> at <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> where there was a <S%H376>man<s%> of [great] <S%H4060>stature<s%> who had twenty-four <S%H676>fingers<s%> and <S%H676>toes,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> [fingers on each hand] and <S%H8337>six<s%> [toes on each foot;] and he <S%H1571>also<s%> was <S%H3205>descended<s%> from the <S%H9571>giants.<s%>
And when he <S%H2778>taunted<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8092>Shimea,<s%> David's <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> him.

<S%H411>These<s%> were <S%H3205>descended<s%> from the <S%H9571>giants<s%> in <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
